thread.title: Future Hints At Rihanna & The Weeknd Features On "HNDRXX"
thread.title_full: Future Hints At Rihanna & The Weeknd Features On "HNDRXX"

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Future Hints At Rihanna & The Weeknd Features On "HNDRXX"
text:
Home > Music > Future Hints At Rihanna & The Weeknd Features On "HNDRXX" Future Hints At Rihanna & The Weeknd Features On "HNDRXX" 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 22, 2017 at 10:41am Future's "HNDRXX" drops this Friday. 
Last night, Future confirmed that he will release HNDRXX this Friday. While his last album FUTURE , released last Friday, was feature-free, Future tagged Rihanna and The Weeknd in an Instagram post of the HNDRXX cover art, hinting that they will appear on the album. 
Chance the Rapper recently shared an extended snippet of a Future collaboration called "My Peak," meaning there's a strong chance that he will appear on the album as well. 
Future followed that post with a sort of HNDRXX mission statement: "Who told u, you couldn't b exactly who u wanted to be? They lied, they wasn't bold they didn't have the ambition they didn't have the courage they was mislead they didn't believe in they self when no one else would." Read the full note below. A post shared by Future Hendrix (@future) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:15pm PST
